title: An unrealistic idea for the in game music
body: I know this sounds crazy but what if every champ had their own theme that played on summoners rift? An example would be that Rengars would be a quick jungle tribal beat while someone like Viktor would have a more mechanical and electric tone. I wish this would be a real thing but I know I have to come to the sad fact that this is never going to happen.

replies.body:
Having the same music with different instruments or accompaniment depending on the champ you are playing, or the champs nearby would be sick.

Or a killing spree theme like Awesomenauts has.
When would this play? I'd say when someone locks in.
